title: Improving Query Representations for Dense Retrieval with Pseudo Relevance Feedback: A Reproducibility Study. (arXiv:2112.06400v2 [cs.IR] UPDATED)
abstract: Pseudo-Relevance Feedback (PRF) utilises the relevance signals from the top-k passages from the first round of retrieval to perform a second round of retrieval aiming to improve search effectiveness. A recent research direction has been the study and development of PRF methods for deep language models based rankers, and in particular in the context of dense retrievers. Dense retrievers, compared to more complex neural rankers, provide a trade-off between effectiveness, which is often reduced compared to more complex neural rankers, and query latency, which also is reduced making the retrieval pipeline more efficient. The introduction of PRF methods for dense retrievers has been motivated as an attempt to further improve their effectiveness.  In this paper, we reproduce and study a recent method for PRF with dense retrievers, called ANCE-PRF. translated_title: 利用伪相关反馈改进密集检索的查询表示：一项可重复性研究
translated_abstract: 伪相关反馈（PRF）利用第一轮检索中前K个检索段落的相关信号来执行第二轮检索，以提高搜索效果。最近的一个研究方向是对基于深度语言模型的排名器进行PRF方法的研究和开发，特别是在密集检索的环境中。与更复杂的神经排名器相比，密集检索器在优化效果和查询延迟之间提供了一种平衡，使得检索管道更加高效。引入PRF方法来改进密集检索器的效果已成为一种尝试。在本文中，我们重复并研究了一种最近的密集检索器的PRF方法，称为ANCE-PRF。该方法将查询文本和前K个反馈段落的文本串联在一起，形成一个新的查询输入，然后被编码成一个密集表示。
tldr: 本文研究并重现了一种新的基于伪相关反馈方法的密集检索器，称为ANCE-PRF。在该方法中，查询文本和前K个反馈段落的文本被串联在一起形成一个新的查询输入，以提高检索效果。
en_tdlr: This paper reproduces and studies a recent PRF method for dense retrievers, called ANCE-PRF, which concatenates the query text and top-k feedback passages to form a new query input, aiming to improve search effectiveness.
